components.password_tip: The password entered this time is only valid during this session, used for installing certificates or setting system proxy!

index.remember_clear_choice: Remember this selection and clear it next time
index.download_no_tip: This type of download is not supported yet. Please copy the link and use other tools to download.
index.import_placeholder: When adding multiple items, ensure each line contains only one (each link on a new line)
index.win_install_tip: For the first time using this software, please right-click and select 'Run as administrator'
index.download_queued: has been added to the queue, current queue length：{count}
index.start_err_content: The current startup process has encountered an issue. Do you want to reset the application?
index.reset_app_tip: This operation will delete intercepted data and data related to this application. Please proceed with caution!

setting.restart_tip: Keep default if unsure, please restart software after modification
setting.filename_rules_tip: Input controls filename length (excluding timestamp, 0 means invalid, effective when description exists), switch controls whether to add timestamp at filename end
setting.full_intercept_tip: Whether to fully intercept WeChat video accounts, No: only intercept video details
setting.insert_tail_tip: Intercept whether new data is added to the end of the list
setting.upstream_proxy_tip: For combining with other proxy tools, format: http://username:password@your.proxy.server:port
setting.download_proxy_tip: Whether to use upstream proxy for downloads
setting.connections_tip: Keep default if unsure, usually CPU cores * 2, for faster downloads
setting.use_headers_tip: Define headers for downloads, comma separated
setting.mime_map_tip: JSON format, keep default if unsure, please restart software after modification

footer.title: About Us
footer.description: A software combining network resource sniffing + high-speed download functions, with high aesthetics, performance and diversity, providing personal users with the ability to download their own resources uploaded to various platforms!
footer.support: Supports almost all network applications on the market
